/usr/bin/g++    -std=c++11 -w -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/curvature.dir/curvature.cpp.o CMakeFiles/curvature.dir/viewer.cpp.o  -o curvature -rdynamic ../externals/surface_mesh/libsurface_mesh.so.1.0 ../nanogui/libnanogui.a -lGL -lXxf86vm -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXcursor -lXi -lX11 -lpthread -lrt -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/a/Bureau/DGP2016_exercises/dgp-exercise4-build/externals/surface_mesh
